name: Monochrome (ChrisD_117, remisnoah, MNCastaneda)
description:
Monochrome is a minimalist 2D platformer where the platforms and background share the colors of black and white. If a platform blends with the background, you cannot jump on it! Luckily, you have the power to change the color of the background! Use your color-switching power to make it to the end of each of the five levels.

 CONTROLS: 

Jump - W and Spacebar 

Move Left - A or Left Arrow Key 

Move Right - D or Right Arrow Key 

Switch Colors - Enter/Return Key
